title: Barbie of Oxford Covid vaccine designer Dame Sarah Gilbert created
description: Dame Sarah Gilbert says she found it "very strange" at first, but hopes it will inspire children.

title: The downfall of Nissan's Carlos Ghosn: An insider's view
description: Former Nissan lawyer Ravinder Passi had a ringside seat of the downfall of chairman Carlos Ghosn.

title: Barbra Streisand: 'I've always had the right to sing what I want'
description: The star looks back at her career, and explains how she's always maintained creative control.

title: Tokyo Olympics sparks anti-LGBT slurs on Russian TV
description: Gay and transgender athletes in Tokyo have been singled out for abuse on Russian state television.

title: CEO Secrets: Airbnb boss shares his business advice
description: Brian Chesky, co-founder and CEO of Airbnb, shares his business advice for the CEO Secrets series.

title: Beirut blast: ‘The day our city exploded’
description: One year on from the blast that rocked Beirut, no one has yet been made accountable.

title: ‘I can’t study sitting on the pavement’
description: Asma Shaikh, a 17-year-old homeless girl, has big dreams. But the pandemic has brought new challenges.

title: 'Witnessing my mum be abused by her ex-partner'
description: Betty Harper, 19, wrote a song the night her mum, Natasha, was beaten by her then-partner.

title: September 11 attacks: What happened on 9/11?
description: How the devastating 2001 plane attacks on America unfolded and how they shaped our age.

title: Abergele: Man in court charged with sister's murder
description: Matthew Selby, 19, appeared at Llandudno magistrates court on Wednesday morning charged with the murder at a holiday park.

title: GB's McCormack wins boxing silver
description: Pat McCormack wins a silver medal for Great Britain after losing a hard-fought men's welterweight contest to Cuba's Roniel Iglesias in Tokyo.

title: Sturgeon to set out plans for lifting restrictions
description: Nicola Sturgeon is to confirm whether Scotland will move beyond level zero on 9 August as planned.

title: Biles 'proud' after Olympic beam bronze on emotional return
description: Simone Biles wins bronze in the beam final in an emotional return to Olympic gymnastics competition.

title: Drug deaths in England and Wales highest since 1993
description: In total, 4,561 deaths related to drug poisoning were registered in England and Wales last year.

title: Kennys both win silver medals as Jason becomes GB's most decorated Olympian
description: Jason Kenny becomes Great Britain's most decorated Olympian as team sprint silver brings an eighth medal after wife Laura takes team pursuit silver.

title: Rishi Sunak warns young home working may hurt their career
description: The chancellor says being in the office helped him build strong relationships when he started out.

title: Afghanistan general says Taliban gains threaten global security
description: An Afghan general warns of devastating consequences if the Taliban win their fight against government forces.

title: Ministers reject calls to lower state pension age to 60
description: The government says lowering the state pension age is not fair or affordable for taxpayers.

title: The collapse of Enron and the dark side of business
description: Twenty years on from the collapse of Enron, are the rules preventing corporate fraud tough enough?

title: Simone Biles: USA gymnast returns at Tokyo Olympics with strong performance in beam final
description: USA's Simone Biles returns to competition with a strong performance in the beam final and wins bronze at the Tokyo Olympics.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Jason Kenny equals British record, Karsten Warholm creates history, Simone Biles returns
description: Giles Scott earns Great Britain's second Olympic sailing gold on Tuesday, starting what Team GB hope will be a medal rush on day 11 of Tokyo 2020.

title: Vitaly Shishov: Head of Belarus exiles group found dead in Ukraine
description: Vitaly Shishov lived in Ukraine and led a group helping people who fled the Belarus crackdown.

title: Grandfather lands 'biggest ever cod' in Scottish waters
description: The fish caught off Shetland weighed in at 49lbs (22kg) and left 60-year-old Tony Urwin "shattered".

title: Chelsea £85m bid for Inter's Lukaku rejected
description: Inter Milan reject Chelsea's £85m bid for striker Romelu Lukaku.

title: Tokyo Olympics: GB's Giles Scott wins Finn class, gold in men's 49er & silver in mixed Nacra 17
description: Great Britain win two golds and a silver on a thrilling day in sailing at the Tokyo 2020 Olympics.

title: Matt Damon says he has never personally used gay slur
description: The Hollywood star had been criticised for saying he had only recently "retired" the insult.

title: Tokyo Olympics: GB and Denmark collide in men's team pursuit
description: Drama in the men's team pursuit qualifying as Denmark's rider collides with GB's Charlie Tanfield.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Sailing gold, a kayak queen and a wondrous world record in day eleven early best bits
description: Watch the best moments from day eleven at the Tokyo Olympics, including a thrilling sailing gold medal for GB, a history making kayak final and a "mind-blowing" new world record.

title: Tokyo Olympics: GB track cyclist Ed Clancy announces retirement and pulls out of remaining events
description: Great Britain's Ed Clancy withdraws from the remainder of Tokyo 2020 and announces his retirement from track cycling because of a persistent back injury.

title: Wuhan: Chinese city to test entire population after virus resurfaces
description: The city of 11 million people is known to be the site where the coronavirus first emerged in 2019.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Team GB win thrilling sailing gold on the line against Germany in 49er
description: Team GB's Dylan Fletcher and Stuart Bithell win sailing gold in a thrilling race for the line against Germany in the 49er medal race.

title: I stopped drinking - then baking business turned my life around
description: Lesley Smith gave up alcohol for the sake of her children but had "no outlet" until she found a passion for making cakes.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Adam Gemili's 200m medal hopes dashed by injury
description: British sprinter Adam Gemili's hopes of a medal in the men's 200m are dashed as he pulls up with an injury in the heats.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Karsten Warholm sets stunning 400m hurdles world record
description: Norwegian Karsten Warholm runs a stunning men's 400m hurdles race to obliterate his previous world record and take gold at Tokyo 2020.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Karsten Warholm sets new world record in 400m hurdles
description: Norway's Karsten Warholm sets a "mind-blowing" new world record of 45.94 seconds to win gold in 400m hurdles at the Olympic Stadium in Tokyo.

title: Gangs on e-scooters targeting GPS farm equipment
description: Total theft claims fall after the pandemic but technology stays a draw for criminals, says insurer.

title: Who is key and where will series be decided between England and India?
description: Can England cope without Ben Stokes? Will India claim a first series win in England since 2007? And which member of the BBC team cannot decide?

title: Tokyo Olympics: GB's Jodie Williams and Ama Pipi through to semi-finals of women's 400m
description: Britain's Jodie Williams wins her heat to join Shaunae Miller-Uibo and Allyson Felix in the 400m semi-finals, with fellow Briton Ama Pipi also qualifying as a fastest loser.
